        Read manhwa "Battle Slime" for free at Summary:The Earth, swept away by the Third World War using nuclear bombs, drives humans and living things to the brink of extinction. A world that has lost the concept of a nation and has become nationalized. The Titan Company gradually recovers the devastated world using slimes and monopolizes resources while growing into a unique company on the planet. Titan has only one goal. Combining slimes and growing children to create a black hole on Earth. Then create a g** who will make his ambitions come true.
